summary: Fixes Tower of Strength and Force Without Effort.
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange]This is now included in the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]. If you are using the patch, you don\'t need this file too.[/color]

Tower of Strength in the base game does nothing at all. The stagger reduction half of Force Without Effort also doesn\'t work. There is a [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6765]fix[/url] available for these, but it has multiple problems, one of which causes the game to crash.

Here\'s a working fix for these abilities that doesn\'t have those issues.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22956]German version available here.[/url]
author: Kevin Kidder

files.name: StaggerFix101
files.changelogHtml: Fixed Logic on Force Without Effort\'s conditionals.
